name: ListComponent
description: Renders a list of items, either ordered or unordered.

context.description: The kebab-case or BEM name of the parent component or variant if contextually relevant

ordered.description: Whether to render an ordered list (ol) or unordered list (ul)

testId.description: Optionally add a data-testid attribute for automated tests

innerComponents.description: List item objects to render inside this list
